aboutDescription: This is where you can write a short paragraph about yourself, your experience, and your passion for web and mobile development.
html5Description: Standard markup language for creating the structure and content of web pages.
cssDescription: Styling language for designing the interface and layout of web pages.
javascriptDescription: Programming language for creating interactive features for web pages.
nuxtjsDescription: Vue.js-based framework for building modern and high-performance web applications.
laravelDescription: Powerful PHP framework for server-side web application development.
reactNativeDescription: Framework for developing cross-platform mobile applications using JavaScript.
expoDescription: Toolset and framework for rapid development of React Native applications.
kotlinDescription: Modern programming language for native Android application development.
flutterDescription: Google's framework for developing high-performance cross-platform mobile applications.
figmaDescription: User interface design tool and prototype creation for web and mobile applications.
uiMobileDescription: Designing user interfaces for mobile applications, optimizing user experience.
prototypeDescription: Creating interactive models to test and present design ideas.
secondPrizeMobileAppChallenge: Second Prize in Mobile App Challenge
subject: Subject
faqAnswer1: I offer web development, mobile app development, and UI/UX design services.
faqQuestion2: How can I request a quote for my project?
faqAnswer2: You can send me a message through the contact form on this page with details about your project, and I'll get back to you with a quote.
faqQuestion3: What is your typical project timeline?
faqAnswer3: Project timelines vary depending on the scope and complexity. I'll provide a detailed timeline estimate after discussing your specific project requirements.
